example.text: For over 100 days, Republicans have urged the president to address this debt crisis, and while we waited for the president to act, [[user]] took action to avoid a default on our debt. Proud to stand with [[user]] and my colleagues in holding this admin accountable. [[url]]
Always great to welcome Hoosiers from the Indiana Leadership Forum to our nation’s capital to talk about what’s going on in Washington and how we can work together to best serve Hoosiers. [[url]]

This administration's border policies aren't just unsustainable, they're nonexistent. After two years of inaction from Democrats, Republicans are fulfilling our promise to restore order at the southern border and end this unprecedented humanitarian and national security crisis. [[url]]
On this National Fentanyl Awareness Day, we must recommit ourselves to addressing this national health crisis. [[url]]

Hitting the Ground Running Thus far, 2023 has been an exciting year as Congressional Republicans began to fulfill our Commitment to America by standing up for the most vulnerable among us with the passage of the Born Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act, establishing a pathway for energy independence by passing the Protecting America's Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act, and getting federal employees back to work so we can finally address sizable agency backlogs affecting thousands of Americans in need of assistance-and we're just getting started. This Congress, I'm also excited to announce that I have joined the House Committee on Foreign Affairs, and I am proud to represent Hoosier farmers and ranchers on the House Committee on Agriculture by serving as the Chairman of the Conservation, Research, and Biotechnology subcommittee.

I am also excited to continue my work on the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology. As we continue to address very real threats to our national security and gear up for the 2023 farm bill, I am excited to work with my colleagues to advance common sense legislation and represent my fellow Hoosiers well on these committees.
